title: Looking for the Option for "vibrate on silent" and intensity control
content:
I need my phone to vibrate in silent/vibration mode only, if I enable the haptic and vibration setting then my phone vibrates in all occasions both with ringtone and if I disable the said option then it doesn't vibrate at all.

Please Also help in controlling vibration pattern and intensity, if there is any...
